message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're just starting the negotiation, I'm willing to make a strong opening offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1200000.

I appreciate your willingness to make a strong opening offer, Alice. However, I was hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I see in the product.
